meanings.definition: Capable of being exchanged or replaced with something else.
meanings.sent1: The swappable parts of the toy allowed for easy customization.
meanings.sent2: The swappable batteries made it convenient to keep the device running.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally put the swappable shoes on the wrong feet!
meanings.sent4: Her mood was as swappable as the weather in spring.
meanings.sent5: The swappable colors of the car made it stand out on the road.

meanings.definition: Able to be interchanged or substituted easily.
meanings.sent1: The swappable seats in the auditorium made it easy to accommodate different events.
meanings.sent2: The swappable memory cards allowed for quick data transfer between devices.
meanings.sent3: He tried to be swappable with his twin brother for a day, but everyone noticed the difference.
meanings.sent4: The swappable roles in the play added an element of surprise to the performance.
meanings.sent5: The swappable toppings on the pizza made it a hit at the party.
